title: Ravaged Zombie
description:
Description
About the Game:

Get ready for Ravaged, an intense online multiplayer first-person shooter. Ravaged is designed with a heavy focus on vehicular combat taking place on vast maps that will have you strategically duking it out on land and in air with over 40 vehicles and weapons. Placed within a competitive team-based environment created specifically for the PC, Ravaged is set in a post-apocalyptic world that was ripped apart by cataclysmic climate change.

The Story:

The Scavengers are an overpowering band of murderous savages hell-bent on taking every last inch of land and every critical resource for themselves. They will stop at nothing. Their success seems certain unless someone can rise up against them. The Resistance is the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s last best hope and humankindÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only chance to restore civilization. Days before the Apocalypse, these freedom fighters were able to seek shelter deep below the Earth, gathering just enough to survive. Finally, they are ready to emerge and rebuild the planet. But itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a new world, overrun by the miscreants and madmen, warlords and hapless refugees. Only the most savage can survive
